medical_history.chief_complaint: Presence of a worm in the mouth.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Approximately 6 months prior to evaluation, the patient noted an irregular area in her cheek that she could feel with her tongue, initially thought to be a patch of dry mucosa. Two days before seeking medical attention, this patch was observed to be a mass that was migrating, with a rate of movement estimated at 2â€“3 cm per day.
medical_history.social_history: Had vacationed in Mexico near the Guatemalan border in April 1999, where she swam in a pond and ate local food that might have contained raw vegetables. She has frequently eaten sushi in the United States.
